Others: The Los Angeles Clippers and Atlanta Hawks are set to face off in a non-conference matchup.
The game is scheduled for January 5, 2025, at 10:30 p.m. EST in Inglewood, California.
The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK line favors the Clippers by 6 points, with an over/under of 229.
The Clippers are 11-6 at home, while the Hawks have gone 8-10 away from home.
The Clippers average 15.6 fast break points per game, led by Norman Powell, while the Hawks average 17.8, led by Jalen Johnson.
The Clippers shoot 46.5% from the field, while the Hawks allow opponents to shoot 47.4%.
The Hawks average 12.8 made 3-pointers per game, 0.1 more than the Clippers give up.
